body.name: Keychron C2 Full Size 104 Keys Wired Mechanical Gaming Keyboard for Mac Layout, K Pro Brown Switch/White LED Backlight/Double Shot ABS Keycaps/USB C Computer Keyboard for Windows Laptop
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 23 hrs 28 mins
features: The Keychron C2 is a full size (with number pad) white LED backlight wired mechanical keyboard made for Mac and Windows. The C2 is crafted to maximize your productivity.

With a layout optimized for Mac, the C2 has all necessary multimedia and function keys (Num Lock works with Windows only), while compatible with Windows, and comes with a dedicated Siri or Cortana key. Extra keycaps for both Mac and Windows operating systems are included.

Designed with reliability in mind, the C2 comes with USB Type-C wired connection with a braid cable, which ensures a constant power supply, and best to fit home and light gaming. Inclined bottom frame and 2 level adjustable feet makes the C2 more comfortable to type.
Durable K Pro mechanical brown switch with 50 million keystroke lifespan, providing unrivaled tactile responsiveness on the Brown switch.

Engineered with double-shot ABS keycaps allows the charming white LED backlight shine through the legends with a subtle feeling. You can also choose static white backlight mode which will match up with your mood.
body.description: Full Size Wired Mechanical Keyboard The Keychron C2 is a full size layout (104-key) white led backlight wired mechanical keyboard engineered for Mac and Windows. The C2 is crafted to maximize your workspace and enhance productivity. With a unique Mac layout, the C2 has all the necessary multimedia and function keys while still being compatible with Windows laptop or PC with a reliable Type-C cable. Keychron K Pro mechanical Brown Switch Durable Keychron K Pro mechanical switch with 50 million keystroke lifespan, providing unrivaled responsiveness on the tactile Brown switch.

The C2 is crafted to maximize your workspace and enhance productivity. With a unique Mac layout, the C2 has all the necessary multimedia and function keys while still being compatible with Windows laptop or PC with a reliable Type-C cable. Keychron K Pro mechanical Brown Switch Durable Keychron K Pro mechanical switch with 50 million keystroke lifespan, providing unrivaled responsiveness on the tactile Brown switch.

Features USB C Wired Mode Designed with reliability in mind, the C2 comes with detachable USB Type-C wired connection with a braid cable ensures a constant power supply, and best to fit home and light gaming. Just plug and use, no driver is needed. For Mac & Windows With a unique Mac layout and Windows compatibility, the C2 is offering convenient accessibility to all the essential multimedia and function keys with number pad included. Extra keycaps for both Mac and Windows operating systems are included. Double shot ABS Keycaps Engineered with double-shot ABS keycaps allows the charming white LED backlight shine through the legends with a subtle feeling.

Features White LED Lighting Options Charming white lighting with elegant legends will match up to your mood, you can also choose other static backlight modes. Adjustable Feet Inclined bottom frame and 2 level adjustable feet makes the C2 more comfortable to type. Community Driven Design Covered by major tech media which thanks to our community that contributed to make a perfect design.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Starting Mechanical Keyboard
reviews.reviewText: Bought this keyboard for my son. For the price, it's looks quite nice and the feels great to use. Would recommend to anyone who wants to dive into custom keyboard without breaking the bank.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars An absolutely fantastic keyboard for the money
reviews.reviewText: I have the nicer, hot-swappable RGB K10 model for home, and I wanted something similar for work but without all the bells and whistles. The Gateron Pro Brown switches are smooth and solid without being too loud. Keycaps have are textured but not rough (K10 keycaps are super smooth; I almost prefer this). The white backlight is nice, for dimmer work areas without adding RGB cost, and I never actually move my keyboard around, so unless you actually intend the keyboard to be mobile, the C series (which is wired only; USB-C) is perfectly fine and saves you some $$. Overall, while there are plenty of good mechanical keyboards, including some nicer Keychrons, I'm not sure there's a better choice for a basic, high-quality fullsize.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 26, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars May have been sent a used/returned keyboard.
reviews.reviewText: Fist off the box the keyboard was in did not have shrink warping on it.The box also seemed to have a shipping label removed with the parts of it left behind and a lot of glue.Opening the box I found the keyboard was not in plastic as it should of been.The keyboard seemed fine and the box did have everything included.I bought the C2 Blue and have not had a mechanical keyboard in a very long time.I found this keyboard to have a great feel and for me, the blue keys were the way to go.It seems to be well made and enjoyed typing with it.The white backlight works well, just wish it had more range adjustment on the brightness levels.Travel of the keys is great and the clicky keys sound great too.I have to say for the price this keyboard is a good value for the money, I would of liked to have been able to get other color keycaps combo on order.I don't know how this keyboard would be for gaming, but think it would be ok in uses for games.I would have given a five star review if not for getting a sealed box.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great keyboard! I was looking for something quiet but also aesthetically pleasing and this checks both boxes. The sound of the keys is like Beethoven's 9th to my nerd ears. Love the options for the lighting effects and the size of the board is still compact but large enough to fit all the keys for my fat @55 fingers. For the price, you can't go wrong with this one.10/10

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value - give it time to break in
reviews.reviewText: ***Update*** After 3 months of use, the new large keys with stabilizers are getting less squeaky. Not sure if it's the additional grease or it just needed to break in, but it is getting close to matching my older keyboard in sound and feel.I bought one of these in 2021 for my office at work. I love it, great value for the money, a joy to type on. I can type much faster on it than the e-waste $12 keyboard and mouse set they gave me.I decided to replace an aging Razor keyboard at home with the same model. Typing is great, but the spacebar has developed a very pronounced squeak. Very annoying. I tried a little white lithium grease on the plastic stabilizers, but it didn't help.I also have a K2 purchased in December 2020. It's held up very well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solid keyboard with nice backlight
reviews.reviewText: I bought this keyboard for my daughter as a gift. She likes the feel of the keystrokes, the clicking sound, and the backlight. She had broken 3 Magic Keyboards so far. Hope this would last much longer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great price and great for office use
reviews.reviewText: Not too loud and has all the basics you need. I'm not a fan of RGB so I'm glad this is just white. I bought another for home as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Looks great and it sounds just the way I was looking for.

reviews.reviewTitle: Es mi primer tecaldo mecánico y me gustó mucho.
reviews.reviewText: Es excelente, muchos efectos de luz, el tacto es muy bueno, tiene un peso adecuado que lo hantenerse en su lugar.incluye teclas intercambiables para windows y mac.
Lovely feel. Looks good. Like the USB options.

reviews.reviewTitle: Good mechanical keyboard but would be god to have an orange ASWD and Arrows keypads!
